definition: to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't

sentences.english: Most of us know the never-ending cycle of living paycheck to paycheck.
sentences.chinese: 我們大多數人都知道生活支出無休無止。

sentences.english: Red and white choice, and choice of endless waiting for reincarnation.
sentences.chinese: 選擇紅與白，選擇無休無止的輪迴和等待。

sentences.english: These are just a few of the questions that provoke endless debate.
sentences.chinese: 這只是無休無止的爭辯中的幾個問題。

sentences.english: The virus can combine and recombine again and again.
sentences.chinese: 病毒也能組合再重組，無休無止。
